TopicTitle: Does microUSB in Samsung Galaxy S3 LTE is replaceable

Articles.Content:
I think my microUSB is damaged, my phone is still on warranty but does it's cover damaged microusb?

My phone cannot charge.

How much rapier would cost.

I think this is more appropriate for the Space Lounge than the Science labs.

You will have to check your warranty, but usually no, only manufacturing faults are covered and user damage requires insurance.

I have no idea what is and what is not covered by your warranty. I have no idea how much repairs like this would cost you. And most likely neither does anybody else here on the forum.

Best thing you can possible do is take your phone back to the place you bought it and ask there. They sold it to you, they should know all relevant details.

I think this is more appropriate for the Space Lounge than the Science labs.

You will have to check your warranty, but usually no, only manufacturing faults are covered and user damage requires insurance.

Sorry

But does fixing MicroUSB is costly?

I do have insurance but for LCD display.
